data.title: Facebook Inc (FB) COB and CEO Mark Zuckerberg Sold $21.6 million of Shares
data.text: COB and CEO of Facebook Inc (30-Year Financial, Insider Trades) Mark Zuckerberg (insider trades) sold 118,500 shares of FB on 08/22/2019 at an average price of $181.91 a share.

data.title: Why Privacy Issues Won’t Be Enough to Keep Facebook’s Stock From Rising
data.text: Facebook has proven time and time again that users aren't going to ditch the social media site anytime soon.

data.title: Spirit Airlines Debuts WhatsApp for Seamless Communication with Guests
data.text: New texting and messaging solution also allows Guests to ask questions, modify travel and make reservations in English and Spanish starting September 1 New texting and messaging solution also allows Guests to ask questions, modify travel and make reservations in English and Spanish starting September 1

data.title: Facebook succeeds in blocking German FCO’s privacy-minded order against combining user data
data.text: Facebook has succeeded in blocking a pioneering order by Germany’s Federal Cartel Office earlier this year that would have banned it from combining data on users across its own suite of social platforms — Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp — without their consent. Pioneering because the antitrust regulator had liaised with EU privacy authorities during a […]

data.title: German cartel office to take Facebook case to High Court
data.text: The German cartel office will appeal a regional court's decision to suspend restrictions it had imposed on Facebook's   data collection practices to the Federal Court of Justice, Germany's highest court.

data.title: German court suspends restrictions on Facebook data gathering
data.text: A German court on Monday temporarily suspended a February decision by the cartel office to order Facebook  to restrict its data collection practices in Germany.

data.title: German court suspends cartel order restricting Facebook's data gathering
data.text: A German court on Monday issued an interim injunction suspending a cartel office decision in February which sought to restrict Facebook's data collection practices in Germany.
